lastReason: Homepage remains Streamlit shell-only in browser snapshot; /_stcore/health is ok but interactive stock list/query UI is still not rendered.
lastBuildText: Fix commit 6f3abb1 pushed; currently still seeing stale shell-only page, likely waiting Render deployment/platform sync.
lastFixSummary: Disabled Streamlit websocket compression in Render start command to mitigate shell-only page when websocket handshake/compression fails behind platform proxy.
